SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT PRIVGRP_SN, PRIVGRP_NAME, PRIVGRP_DESC, IFNULL(PRIORT, '0') AS PRIORT, IF(USE_YN='Y', '사용', '미사용') AS USE_YN, UPDT_DT, UPDUSR_SN, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RNUM FROM SM_PRIVGRP, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE PRIVGRP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #TXT_SEARCH_PRIVGRP_NAME#, '%')
AND USE_YN LIKE CONCAT('%', #SLT_SEARCH_USE_YN#, '%')
ORDER BY PRIORT ASC ) A
WHERE A.RNUM >= #START_ROW# AND A.RNUM <= #END_ROW#
SELECT PRIVGRP_SN, PRIVGRP_NAME, PRIVGRP_DESC, PRIORT, USE_YN, UPDT_DT, UPDUSR_SN FROM SM_PRIVGRP WHERE PRIVGRP_SN = #TXT_HIDDEN_PRIVGRP_SN#
